tool.name: WGS-assembler for PacBio
tool.description: Run wgs-assembler on PacBio corrected reads
tool.command:
mkdir -p $pacbio_scaffolds.files_path && cd $pacbio_scaffolds.files_path &&
sed -i 's:^fastqReads=.*:fastqReads=$pacbio_fq:g' $pacbio_frg &&
ln -s $pacbio_frg pacbio.frg &&
runCA -p asm -d asm -s ${GALAXY_DATA_INDEX_DIR}/asm.spec pacbio.frg 2> /dev/null
&& mv asm/9-terminator/asm.scf.fasta $pacbio_scaffolds
&& rm -rf $pacbio_scaffolds.files_path
